[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ContextMenuRegistry](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.md)

## ContextMenuRegistry class

Class for the registry of context menu items. This is intended to be a singleton. You should not create a new instance, and only access this class from ContextMenuRegistry.registry.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ContextMenuRegistry 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./blockly.contextmenuregistry._constructor_.md) |  | Resets the existing singleton instance of ContextMenuRegistry. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [registry](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.registry.md) | <code>static</code> | [ContextMenuRegistry](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.md) |  |
|  [ScopeType](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.scopetype.md) | <code>static</code> | typeof ScopeType | Where this menu item should be rendered. If the menu item should be rendered in multiple scopes, e.g. on both a block and a workspace, it should be registered for each scope. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getContextMenuOptions(scopeType, scope)](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.getcontextmenuoptions.md) |  | Gets the valid context menu options for the given scope type (e.g. block or workspace) and scope. Blocks are only shown if the preconditionFn shows they should not be hidden. |
|  [getItem(id)](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.getitem.md) |  |  |
|  [register(item)](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.register.md) |  | Registers a RegistryItem. |
|  [reset()](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.reset.md) |  | Clear and recreate the registry. |
|  [unregister(id)](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.unregister.md) |  | Unregisters a RegistryItem with the given ID. |
